betterquesting:10.desc:8:
A key part of cropsnh is improving the stats of your crops. There is always a chance for this to occur whenever a new crop grows - whether by self propogation or crossing...


§aGrowth§r:
- How fast it grows, with higher = faster. Specifically it increases the growth points your crop gets per tick. If it gets to 24+, your crop acts like a weed, so make sure you increase that resistance stat in parralel.

§9Gain§r:
- With higher levels of gain, you get more when you harvest your crops! Pretty self explanitory.

§eResistance§r:
- A resistance of 10 will guarantee a seed drop with a spade. 20 and 30 will drop 2 or 3 seeds, respectively. A resistance of 31 will guarantee a seed drop without a spade.

- If the Growth stat is greater than 23, resistance will help prevent weeds from spreading. A resistance of 31 will stop the crop from spreading weeds entirely.
